context: I like Black Hawk Down. I saw it the other night for the tenth time. Do you know of any other films that are somewhat similar?

I think I like action more, but I do enjoy this type of war film. Could you give me examples of similar war films?
You might like the War film Zero Dark Thirty or The men who stare at goats
I heard good things about Zero Dark Thirty. Who stars in that one?
Zero Dark Thirty stars Stephen Dillane who is also in the Truth About Charlie and the Greatest Game Ever Played
Doesn't The Truth About Charlie also star Tom Robbins? What other films might I know him from?
resp: Tim Robbins is also in the City of Ember and Cinema Verite
